Class GameMedia

java.lang.Object
GameMedia
public class GameMedia
extends java.lang.Object
The GameMedia class adds the functionality to play sound to my project using javafx's built-in "MediaPlayer" and "AudioClip" imports. The Mediaplayer object is used to play the game's main theme and I'm using the AudioClip object to play the game specific sounds. I am doing it this way as AudioClip can be called over and over with minimal latency, whereas the MediaPlayer needs to be reset to time 0 before playing the sound again.
Author:
Finlay Watling
